short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for Miscellaneous Grocery Products in Quebec, Canada.
description: This tender is issued on behalf of the Department of National Defense, Correctional Services Canada and Fisheries and Oceans Canada for the acquisition of miscellaneous grocery products located in Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
#### 📲 Government Tender Announcement
### E6MON-24PQEP - Period 01 - RMSO Groceries, Miscellaneous

**Tender Information:**
* **Reference Number**: WS4541227708-Doc4565216843
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4541227708
* **Publication Date**: May 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 12, 2024, 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Amendment Date**: May 28, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Details:**
* **Procurement Category**: Government Departments (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Notice Type:** 
* **Eng**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Fra**: Demande d’offre à commandes

**Regions:**
* **Delivery Regions**: Quebec (except NCR)
* **trade Agreements:**

    Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information:** 

* **Name**: Ly, Selina (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19579079?extsite=MTk1NzkwNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Standing Offer for the acquisition of miscellaneous grocery products. The products to be acquired are detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirement. Interested suppliers can access the tender by visiting the provided link. Contact Selina Ly
